name: rubyexpert
0:
”Alexa, ask ruby expert tell me something”
”Alexa, ask ruby expert tell me a fact about ruby”
”Alexa, ask ruby expert give me a fact about ruby”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ruby expert
des: This skill tells user about some fun facts about the Ruby programming language. User can ask something like, "Alexa, ask ruby expert to tell me a fact about ruby." The skill responds with a randomly selected known fact about the Ruby.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
